form.label: Help Desk - Password Expiration (90 Day Password Expiration)

search.query: | inputlookup AD.Users.LDAP.list.csv | makemv delim="####" memberOf | makemv delim="|" objectClass | makemv delim=" " userAccountControl | makemv delim="####" dSCorePropagationData | table * | search cn="*" domain="*" pwdLastSet>0 | table sAMAccountName | sort sAMAccountName

| inputlookup AD.Users.LDAP.list2.csv | makemv delim="####" memberOf | makemv delim="|" objectClass | makemv delim=" " userAccountControl | makemv delim="####" dSCorePropagationData | table * | search cn="*" domain="*" pwdLastSet>0 sAMAccountName="$name$" | eval dateLastSet=strptime(pwdLastSet, "%H:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y") | eval epochNextSet=(dateLastSet+7776000) | eval diff=round(epochNextSet-now(),0) | eval daysUntilExpire=round(diff/86400,0) | eval daysSincePwdChange=(90-daysUntilExpire) | eval dateNextSet=strftime(epochNextSet, "%H:%M %p, %a %m/%d/%Y") | table name, pwdLastSet, daysUntilExpire, daysSincePwdChange, dateNextSet, lockoutTime, lastLogon | sort daysUntilExpire | rename name as "Username", pwdLastSet as "Date of Last Password Reset" daysUntilExpire as "Days Until Password Expire", daysSincePwdChange as "Days Since Last Password Change", dateNextSet as "Date to Change Password", lockoutTime as "Last Time User Locked Out" lastLogon as "Last Successful Logon"
